setUpdateFrequency

public void setUpdateFrequency(SBLocationManager.Frequency updateFrequency)
Set new value of frequency update.

The monitoring system (SBLocationManager shared instance) will start and stop beacons detection for each cycle defined by frequency update value.

Example: If you define updateFrequency to Frequency.DEFAULT (eq. 3 seconds), so SBLocationManager shared instance will monitor for 3 seconds, then it will pause for 3 seconds and go on.

This is a limitation for device life battery saving.

Parameters:
updateFrequency - SBLocationManager.Frequency
See Also:
SBLocationManager.Frequency

addEntireSBRegion

public boolean addEntireSBRegion()
Register entire SmartBeacon region to listen. Alias call of addBeaconRegion() with SBRegion.entireSBRegion()

Returns:
true if region has been correctly added, otherwise false;

addBeaconRegion

public boolean addBeaconRegion(SBRegion region)
Register entire SmartBeacon region to listen. May return false if region identifier is already used for another region.

Parameters:
region - SBRegion instance
Returns:
true if region has been correctly added, otherwise false.

removeBeaconRegion

public boolean removeBeaconRegion(SBRegion region)
Unregister beacon region. May return false if no region has been removed (in cache regions).

Parameters:
region - region to remove
Returns:
true if region has been correctly removed, otherwise false.

startMonitoringAllBeaconRegions

public void startMonitoringAllBeaconRegions()
Start monitoring and ranging all beacon regions (registered in cache). Use addBeaconRegion for add some region.

This is an asynchronous method.

See Also:
setUpdateFrequency

stopMonitoringAllBeaconRegions

public void stopMonitoringAllBeaconRegions()
Stop monitoring and ranging all beacon regions (registered in cache).

This is an asynchronous method.

See Also:
setUpdateFrequency

isMonitoring

public boolean isMonitoring()
Returns true if SBLocationManager shared instance is monitoring

Returns:
true if SBLocationManager shared instance is currently monitoring, false otherwise

isScanning

public boolean isScanning()
Returns true if SBLocationManager shared instance is monitoring and in listening cycle

Returns:
true if SBLocationManager shared instance is currently scanning, false otherwise
